org.activebpel.rt.bpeladmin.war.graph.ui
Class AeContainer

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          org.activebpel.rt.bpeladmin.war.graph.ui.AeComponent
              org.activebpel.rt.bpeladmin.war.graph.ui.AeContainer
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
AeGraphFigure, AeIconLabel
public class AeContainer
extends AeComponent

AeContainer UI widget acts as a container to hold AeComponent objects using the composite pattern. This class is also responsible for delegating the paint calls to its children.

See Also:
Serialized Form

Method Detail

paint

public void paint(java.awt.Graphics g)
Overrides method to delegate paint calls to paintComponent(), paintBorder and paintChildren. It is not recomended that subclasses override this method.

See Also:
Component.paint(java.awt.Graphics)

paintComponent

public void paintComponent(java.awt.Graphics g)
Paints this component. Subclasses should over ride this method to render itself.

Parameters:
g - graphics context

paintBorder

public void paintBorder(java.awt.Graphics g)
Paints this component. Subclasses should over ride this method to render it's border.

Parameters:
g - graphics context

paintChildren

public void paintChildren(java.awt.Graphics g)
Paints the children contained in this component.

Parameters:
g - graphics context
